card.name: Adria
card.property: You may boost Adria with any Ori card. Stop Adria - Play an Ori obstacle at no cost.

card.name: Anateo
card.property: Anateo gets difficulty +1 for each complication at the current mission. Each time you assign Anateo, destroy all obstacles and stop a hero ship. While Anateo is assigned, you can't play obstacles and complications cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Arkhad
card.property: Each time you play an Ori obstacle, you may discard a card. If you do, ready Arkhad. Failure: Choose one: Incapacitate an assigned team character, or gain 1 power for each Ori obstacle.

card.name: Baal
card.property: Destroy another Goa'uld adversary - Gain 1 power for each Goa'uld adversary card in your villain score pile. You can do this only once per turn.

card.name: The Doci
card.property: Each time you pay the Doci's revive cost, take each Ori card you would discard into hand instead.

card.name: James Marrick
card.property: Stop James Marrick - Gain 1 power. When James Marrick is destroyed, if there was a Replicator obstacle at the mission, you may search your hand and deck for a copy of Replicator Marrick, play it at no cost, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: "Kenny"
card.property: While "Kenny" is assigned, each time your opponent would drain cards, you may choose to reduce the number of drained cards to zero. If you do, draw a card for each card he would have otherwise drained.

card.name: Qetesh
card.property: Qetesh gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1 for each Goa'uld adversary card in your villain score pile. Destroy another adversary - Qetesh gets difficulty +2 and revive cost +2 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Replicator Marrick
card.property: When you play Replicator Marrick, you may destroy a support character and place him face up beneath this card. While there is a support character card beneath Replicator Marrick, it gets Combat +1 and if it would be destroyed, you may discard the card beneath it to have it become stopped instead.

card.name: Second
card.property: Second gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1 for each other Replicator adversary.

card.name: Seth
card.property: While Seth is assigned, each time your opponent plays a support character, stop that character. Seth gets revive cost -1 for each stopped support character.

card.name: Solemn Prior
card.property: Each time you assign Solemn Prior, you may return a support character card from your opponent's discard pile to their hand. If you do, gain 1 power for each assigned team character. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Wraith Primary
card.property: Each time you assign Wraith Primary, your opponent may drain 2 (they put the top two cards of their deck into their discard pile). If they don't, gain 2 power.

card.name: Claire Tobias
card.property: When you play Claire Tobias, you may destroy a gear. If you do, gain 2 power. Success: You may destroy a gear. If you do, gain power equal to that gear's cost.

card.name: Dmitri Sidorov
card.property: When Dmitri Sidorov is destroyed, your opponent loses 1 power. Failure: You may destroy Dmitri Sidorov. If you do, the next mission costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Ivanova
card.property: When Ivanova is destroyed, draw a card. Failure: You may destroy Ivanova and discard a card. If you do, ready another assigned character.

card.name: Jones
card.property: When you play Jones, you may choose one: stop a villain ship; or ready a hero ship.

card.name: Kakalios
card.property: When you play Kakalios, you may pay X power. If you do, draw X cards. While you have eight cards or more in hand, Kakalios gets skills +1.

card.name: Korra
card.property: Each time you assign Korra, you may pay 1 power. If you don't, he gets skills -1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Marchenko
card.property: When Marchenko is destroyed, gain 1 power. Stop and destroy Marchenko, pay 1 power - Remove the failure text from one card at the current mission.

card.name: Morgan le Fay
card.property: Stop Morgan le Fay, pay 2 power - Your opponent may pay 2 power. If they don't, they discard 2 cards at random. Stop and purge Morgan le Fay - Purge an Ori adversary (they are both removed from the game).

card.name: Oksana Petrova
card.property: Each time a Disease obstacle is played while Oksana Petrova is assigned, you may destroy her. If you do, destroy that obstacle.

card.name: Wotan
card.property: When you play Wotan, you may search your deck for an Asgard card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. Stop Wotan - Gain 1 power.

card.name: Abraham Ellis
card.property: Triangulum: Team characters get skills +1 while assigned with one or more hero ships totaling 4 firepower or more.

card.name: Aris Boch
card.property: Missions with a glyph matching one of Aris Boch's get difficulty -1. Pisces or Triangulum, Pay 1 power - If Aris Boch is assigned, ready him and block him from the current mission.

card.name: Chekov
card.property: Orion or Triangulum: Political obstacles cost power +1 to play. Orion and Triangulum: Russian support characters cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Dean Newman
card.property: Orion: Each time a gear is destroyed, you may draw a card. Orion and Scorpius: Science and Combat obstacles cost power +1 to play.

card.name: Jonas Quinn
card.property: Each time you assign Jonas Quinn, if he has at least one glyph, you may search your deck for a hero card that costs equal to or less than the number of glyphs he has. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Malcolm Barrett
card.property: Scorpius: Malcolm Barrett gets Science +1. Pisces and Scorpius: Stop Malcolm Barrett, pay 2 power - Stop an adversary. If Malcolm Barrett has 3 Combat or more, destroy that adversary instead.

card.name: Penegal
card.property: Scorpius and Scorpius: Asgard ships get: "Stop this ship, pay 1 power - Choose a character or adversary. They become ready and blocked from the current mission. You may pay power. If you do, unblock them."

card.name: Tanith
card.property: While Tanith is ready, Goa'uld cards cost power -1 to play. During your opponents turn, Tanith becomes aa Goa'uld adversary with revive cost 0, who can't be assigned or scored. If he would leave play for any reason, he is incapacitated instead.

card.name: Vala Mal Doran
card.property: Each time Vala Mal Doran earns a glyph, for each glyph she has, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a villain card, discard it and gain 1 power. If it's a hero card, take it into hand and your opponent draws a card.

card.name: Zukhov
card.property: Each time a Russian support character is destroyed, draw a card. Libra or Triangulum: Zukhov gets skills +1 for each Russian support character that was destroyed this turn.

card.name: Any Second Now
card.property: You can play this event only if your opponent's last action was to pass. Draw a card, gain 1 power, and purge this event (remove it from the game).

card.name: Ascension
card.property: Incapacitate a team character, and place this card on them, face up. At the start of each of your turns, you must choose to either destroy Ascension or pay 2 power to keep that character incapacitated. While Ascension is on the incapacitated character, Culture and Science missions get difficulty -2.

card.name: Band of Brothers
card.property: To play this event, incapacitate an assigned SGC or Atlantis team character. Ready and/or unblock all other non-assigned SGC and Atlantis characters.

card.name: Banned Gate Address
card.property: The current mission gets: "Failure: Incapacitate a team character and purge this mission (it's removed from the game and won't count as a failed mission)." Purge this event.

card.name: Intervention
card.property: To play this event, stop an Ancient character. Ready an incapacitated character (they are no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Lucky Shot
card.property: To play this event, stop a hero ship and a character. Destroy a villain ship with firepower equal to or lower than the stopped hero ship's firepower plus the stopped character's Combat.

card.name: Remembering Heroes
card.property: If a character was incapacitated or destroyed this turn, gain 1 power. If a mission was failed this turn, gain 1 power. Draw a card, then purge this event.(Remove it from the game.)

card.name: Routine Mission
card.property: You can play this event only if the experience of the current mission is 2 or less. Choose one: ready a team character; or destroy an obstacle that costs 3 or less; or block aa ready adversary from the current mission.

card.name: Russian Bravado
card.property: To play this event, stop and destroy a support character. Until the end of the turn, your cards consider the number of failed missions to be one higher (or two higher if the destroyed character was Russian).

card.name: AGM-65 Maverick
card.property: Destroy this gear, stop an assigned character, pay 2 power - Destroy an assigned adversary or an obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Ark of Truth
card.property: Destroy this gear, stop a character with 2 Culture or more, pay 2 power - Destroy an Ori obstacle or assigned Ori adversary. Then your opponent reveals the cards in their hand and you may choose one of them to discard.

card.name: Asgard Upgrades
card.property: Destroy this gear - Place it face up beneath a non-Asgard hero ship. While this gear is beneath a ship, that ship gets the Asgard trait, firepower +1, and: "Each time this ship would be incapacitated or destroyed, you may purge this gear. If you do, the ship is stopped instead."

card.name: A.T.A. Gene Therapy
card.property: Destroy this gear - Place it face up beneath a character. While this gear is beneath a character, they get the Ancient trait, and: "This character gets Science +1 while you have at least one Ancient gear."

card.name: C4 Charge
card.property: Stop aa character who has 1 Combat or more, destroy this gear - Choose one: destroy a Combat obstacle at the current mission; or destroy an assigned villain ship.

card.name: Goa'uld Communication Device
card.property: Stop this gear, discard a card - Your opponent chooses and discards a card from their hand. If it's a hero card, choose a character to get skills +1 until the end of the mission (or +2 if the chosen character is NID). If it's a villain card, draw a card.

card.name: Improvised Weapon
card.property: Stop and destroy this gear - Choose an assigned adversary to get difficulty -1 until the end of the current mission. If it is a Combat or Ingenuity mission, draw a card.

card.name: Legacy of the Asgard
card.property: Asgard events, gears, and ships cost power -1 to play. Stop this gear, pay 1 power, discard a card - Choose a non-Asgard character to get skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Amnesia
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready team character. They are blocked. Failure: Place this obstacle face up beneath the chosen character. While this card is beneath a character, they are blocked, and their owner may perform this action: "Discard three hero cards - Destroy this card."

card.name: Arcane Technology
card.property: You can play this obstacle only if this is your first opportunity to act at the current mission. When you play this obstacle, the current mission becomes a Science or Ingenuity mission (you choose). Ready all assigned characters.

card.name: Bombardment
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned villain ship. While the chosen ship is assigned to the current mission, this obstacle's difficulty is equal to its firepower. Failure: Destroy an assigned support character for each assigned villain ship.

card.name: The Book of Origin
card.property: While an Ori adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets dominion (when you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion).

card.name: Exhausted
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle face up beneath a stopped or assigned character. They get skills -3, and their owner may perform this action: "Pay 3 power - Destroy this obstacle."

card.name: Forced Retirement
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready a number of assigned characters equal to the experience of this mission. To assign a character, your opponent must pay 1 power.

card.name: Fragile Peace Talks
card.property: You can play this obstacle only if this is your first opportunity to act at the current mission. When you play this obstacle, the current mission becomes a Culture or Combat mission (you choose). Ready all assigned characters.

card.name: Kara Kesh
card.property: Each time a Goa'uld adversary would be stopped and/or destroyed by one of your opponent's cards, you may destroy this obstacle. If you do, prevent the stopping and/or destruction.

card.name: Lor Kor Harak
card.property: To play this obstacle, discard a card. This obstacle's difficulty is equal to half the discarded card's cost (rounded down). If you discarded a Goa'uld adversary, the difficulty is equal to that card's cost instead.

card.name: Men in Black
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned support character and block them from the current mission. Failure: Destroy the blocked character.

card.name: Occupation
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns a character, you may draw a card. Failure: If you have more than eight cards in hand, discard down to eight. For each card you discarded this way, your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Paranoia
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose two support characters. They become ready. While either one of them is assigned, the other is blocked. Failure: If either one of the chosen support characters is assigned, destroy them both.

card.name: Rampant Pandemic
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each mission played before the current mission this turn. This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each mission played before the current mission this turn.

card.name: Replicator Queen
card.property: Discard a card - Play a Replicator obstacle. It costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Staff Cannon
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) Destroy this obstacle - Destroy an assigned support character.

card.name: Stranded
card.property: Failure: Your opponent can't play any more missions this turn.

card.name: Submerged
card.property: Each time you pass, place a Water counter on this obstacle. This obstacle's difficulty is equal to the number of Water counters on it.

card.name: Tampered DHD
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop any number of characters with a total of 3 Science or more, or pay 3 power. If he does neither, all characters are blocked.

card.name: They're Coming!
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may reveal the top four cards of your deck. If you do, take each Replicator card you revealed this way into hand, and discard the rest.

card.name: Time-Trap Maze
card.property: Each time a character is stopped by another card, you may pay 1 power. If you do, stop a support character.

card.name: Toxic Environment
card.property: Support characters are blocked. Failure: Destroy all assigned support characters.

card.name: United Under One Banner
card.property: You may assign any number of adversaries to the current mission. (If this obstacle is destroyed before the resolution of the mission, the assigned adversaries remain assigned. During a mission's resolution, you can score only one of the assigned adversaries.)

card.name: Utter Destruction
card.property: Failure: Destroy all assigned support characters. Then if you achieved Victory during the ship battle at the current mission, incapacitate all assigned team characters.

card.name: Apollo
card.property: Pay 2 power, discard a card - This ship gets firepower +2. You can do this only once each mission. Victory: Gain 1 power.

card.name: Asgard Research Vessel
card.property: Stop this ship, discard a card - Your opponent reveals a random card from their hand. If it's a hero card, gain 1 power. If it's a villain card, they lose 1 power.

card.name: Jaffa Troopship
card.property: Pay 1 power, discard all cards beneath this ship - Place an obstacle from your hand face down beneath this ship. While this ship is assigned, you may play the obstacle beneath it as if it was in your hand, and it costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Lucian Alliance Ha'tak
card.property: Each adversary card with no trait other then adversary in your villain score pile gets cost +1. This ship gets firepower +1 for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Todd's Hiveship
card.property: This ship gets firepower +1 for each obstacle at the current mission. Pay 1 power - During your next turn (as the hero player), this ship becomes a hero ship.
